p: With these results, it is possible to establish that the pharmacological effects attributed to S. macrostema in Mexican folk medicine are due in part to the antioxidant activity, which has also been linked to other species of Satureja.[ 18 19 20 50] The essential oil of S. macrostema may be considered as potential natural antioxidants and used to prevent oxidative stress that contributes to many degenerative diseases.
